sources.title: Pin Up Girl (1944)
sources.description: Glamorous Lorry Jones, the toast of a Missouri military canteen, has become "engaged" to almost every serviceman she's signed her pin-up photo for. Now she's leaving home to go into government service (not, as she fantasizes, to join the USO). On a side trip to New York, her vivid imagination leads her to True Love with naval hero Tommy Dooley; but increasingly involved Musical Comedy Complications follow. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/pin-up-girl-1944/

metadata.Plot: Glamorous Lorry Jones, the toast of a Missouri military canteen, has become "engaged" to almost every serviceman she's signed her pin-up photo for. Now she's leaving home to go into government service (not, as she fantasizes, to join the USO). On a side trip to New York, her vivid imagination leads her to True Love with naval hero Tommy Dooley; but increasingly involved Musical Comedy Complications follow.
metadata.Writer: Robert Ellis, Helen Logan, Earl Baldwin
metadata.Actors: Betty Grable, John Harvey, Martha Raye
